website_summaries.verdict: Like a real hurricane, this quality 2.25HP blender is quite powerful considering its price tag.
pros: Performs as expected and blends all ingredients very well
Features a timer and a BPA-free container with a large 60-ounce capacity
Very easy to use controls with accurately functioning presets for smoothies, soup, etc
cons: Lid is tough to get off and the unit runs very loudly

customer_reviews.title: Blade creates an air bubble with little control
customer_reviews.text: The blade on this blender runs way too fast even on the low settings and creates air bubbles that cause too much hassle when blending anything other than smoothies. I wish the automatic speed adjustment worked well enough to make this useful beyond a shortlist of items, it is too noisy, too fast and too much of a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: This came with obvious defects and made me question quality control.
customer_reviews.text: I received the blender and was pleased with the appearance and price point. The base felt incredibly light and it seemed to be not sturdy at all. I figured I could live with that but When I looked at the jar I noticed there were several imperfections including a big scratch. This item was brand new. It was packaged as it had come directly from manufacturer and I do not believe my blender was used. It just made me really question quality control so I returned and went with something else.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted a year - another crappy product made in China
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product on sale a year ago and have only been using it for the last six months when it started to leave black particles in my food. Needless to say, I've stopped using it. It was an okay blender, but could never get a smooth smoothie out of it. It was also a pain to clean. Anyway, if you're going to use your blender for more than the occasional mixed drink, don't waste your money on this one, put down the extra cash for one of the professional ones. I decided I wanted more out of my next blender so I replaced it with a Vitamix.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonTink

customer_reviews.title: Best blender for baby food
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I got this blender! After using poor quality blenders like ninja and magic bullet, I’ve decided that it’s time for a good , powerful blender. I’ve reviewed a lot of high- end blenders like vitamix or blendtec , which are probably great but their prices are quite high. And then Cuisinart hurricane caught my eye and I’ve decided to give it a try. So, this blender is VERY powerful! It blends perfect green smoothies for my baby. Even kale and chia seeds are dissolved! It’s on a loud side though. But other than that , I am completely happy with my purchase! For the price-quality ratio this blender is the best value !
customer_reviews.author: Yigal - Julia

customer_reviews.title: Not all about the base
customer_reviews.text: I mainly use my blender for sauces (my old one broke) and you cannot make bearnaise or hollandaise with this blender. The base is too wide and the blade is too high. It cannot grind or puree small things and things get flung to the side and stick there. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Cantera

customer_reviews.title: It cleans up very easily with its clean setting
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely FABULOUS! i use it everyday for smoothies and it performs perfectly. My smoothies come out just right with the presets on the unit. It cleans up very easily with its clean setting, too. I would recommend this mode to anyone who needs ice crushing and raw veggies to be pureed. It's amazing how simple it makes everything.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Heinecke

customer_reviews.title: EXCEPTIONAL PRO GRADE & STYLE
customer_reviews.text: THE WHITE LID IS A PLUS (SO TIRED OF BLACK) THIS MODEL IS STYLED TO LOOK NICE IN A NICE HOME OR BUSINESS. OF COURSE STYLE IS NOT THE REASON TO RATE IT OR BUY. OUT OF THE BOX IT SCREAMED PRO GRADE. ITS EASIER TO USE THAN THE DESCRIPTION STATES. MY TOMATO, CELERY, ICE, CARROT SMOOTHIE HAD ZERO PARTICLES OR CHUNKS... I FELL IN LOVE WITH IT, I HOPE YOU WILL TOO:-) AS OF FRI 25 JAN 19.
customer_reviews.author: BILL NICOLEN

customer_reviews.title: Great Blender
customer_reviews.text: I needed a really great blender and this one fits the bill. It's very powerful and does everything it's supposed to. It really goes to town on ice for those Margaritas. It has six blades instead of 4. It's easy to clean. I really can't find anything negative about this blender. Yes, it's expensive but it doesn't cost $400 like some of those others I saw on line. I would definitely but it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ended!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Best blender I've ever used. Nice not to have screw-on base with the seal that tends to leak. Lots of power! Make sure the measuring cap is tight on the lid and the lid is firmly closed; the powerful action can force food out and make a mess. I'm glad I got the larger pitcher and strong get motor. It will do everything I need from Smoothies to apple sauce, to pureeing my spaghetti sauce.
customer_reviews.author: Honmom

customer_reviews.title: This blender is 3 years old
customer_reviews.text: When I picked up the box I thought it was for something I ordered other than the blender. Very light, very cheaply made, very loud,lots of plastic. Since I have many Cuisinart products I wrote to customer care to see voice my displeasure with the quality of the blender - they wrote back to let me know it's 3 years old. I sent it back to Amazon for a refund. I won't be buying anything Cuisinart any time soon and I'll always check the age of a product before I make another purchase from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: dstpaul

customer_reviews.title: Love this blender
customer_reviews.text: I love the performance. I was using a ninja to made veggie smoothies. Horrible consistency. This blender does excellent job. Texture completely smooth (& fast ). I find getting the lid off is annoying. I guess powerful suction. When I was not willing to pay $500 for a blender. This was great option. I paid almost $160 so this is an excellent price
customer_reviews.author: Sheila O.

customer_reviews.title: Beyond awesome! Chops up strawberry seeds and spinach easily
customer_reviews.text: Beyond awesome! Chops up strawberry seeds and spinach easily. Rated high in consumer reports- they were right! This a a keeper! Can't go wrong with this blender. Pulverizes coconut, makes ice into snow-- performs above expectation. Has a cleaning cycle. Quality product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in February 2019. Used once daily on Smoothie setting. August 20th, automatically shut off after 30 seconds due to overheating. Let it rest for 24 hours and it worked OK the next day. Engine burned out August 26th. A lot of money for only 6 months of use x 1 time a day.
customer_reviews.author: Sue P

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the BEST blender ever!  Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a blender that does not require a wand to clear the air bubble and makes a smoothie so perfectly blended and thick! I could not be happier. I've gone through 5 other top end blenders all noisy or by the time you get the frozen fruit blended you have a watery mess. This one I use the default time. I just select Smoothie and bam! done and perfect every time. What a perfect addition to our home. :)
customer_reviews.author: Ken & Lina

customer_reviews.title: SO disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: I just used this for the first time, and it is 6 weeks past the due date of return, or I'd return it in a second. Maybe a half of a second. It's so unnecessarily noisy, and doesn't blend as well as description stated. My old Cuisinart blender that I parted with for the new version was much better than this one. I regret that I didn't open it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Myra Landau

customer_reviews.title: Great blender
customer_reviews.text: I chose this blender over a Vitamix. I compared them both and felt that the Cuisinart is an excellent value for the price. I knocked a little off for the noise however all blenders are somewhat noisy. This one is substantially quieter than the Ninja that I owned previously.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: So so glad I read ALL the reviews. This machine works great. I make smoothies every day.. with all fresh ingredients.. real spinach with stems, real grapefruit with peel, Real lemon with peel, Avocado, hemp seeds, and my organic stevia leaves. I imagined it to be super loud,because of the reviews but it's comparable to any other blenders.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa S.

customer_reviews.title: Function and fashion
customer_reviews.text: This blender is very sturdy and is easy to clean and use. Dedicated programs for smoothies, cleaning, ice etc are really useful. I use it several times a week for smoothies and look forward to experimenting with other options
customer_reviews.author: dog lover1

customer_reviews.title: Blends great, but wear hearing protection
customer_reviews.text: This does a great job on smoothies, but it's LOUD. Phone app says it's 90+ Db, which is loud enough to cause permanent hearing loss. Make sure to wear some earplugs while you're using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is the most powerful blender we have ever owned. It makes smoothies with ease. No strain with the power of this blender.
customer_reviews.author: rick

customer_reviews.title: Nice blender, but not worth the price IMO.
customer_reviews.text: It is a good, powerful blender. The capacity is average, and it is easy to clean. it does not get stock on crushing ice or hard frozen fruit, but its features are lacking and gimmicky. You're paying for the styling and the brand. There are similar options that cost half the price or less.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just opened...... NOT Good!
customer_reviews.text: Got it today and just opened it up, unfortunately the base is severely damaged / corroded. I thought I was buying a new product Considering the cost of this thing, it's a disappointing start.
customer_reviews.author: SolH

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Very nice blender considering the price. While not the equal of a Vitamix or Breville Boss (my favorite) it is very close. For most people the cost difference is probably not justified.
customer_reviews.author: Bill G

customer_reviews.title: Great blender but liquid seeps out of top cap area when blending
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a good blender but when I make shakes some of the liquid seeps out around the center clear cap and is annoying but blender still works good.
customer_reviews.author: Dalex

customer_reviews.title: Great first two years
customer_reviews.text: This blender was forceful and easy to clean. Loved it! But after two years of daily use to make my smoothie, it started to spew oil or grease in the bottom area. Now it also leaks liquid into the mechanism. I called to report problems, and they said it would take 4-6 weeks to return repaired blender. Couldn’t say how much it would cost. This was a pricey blender, so I would expect no charge.
customer_reviews.author: PIK

customer_reviews.title: cheap pitcher for the money
customer_reviews.text: the plastic pitcher do not think will last long under multiple washing in dishwasher motor and balance seems adequate but should have been a glass container not plastic
customer_reviews.author: bryanp

customer_reviews.title: Loud but solid construction
customer_reviews.text: Followed instructions from the manufacturer's book to make a nutrition shake. Almost siezed the motor on day 1. If you don't add the right amount of liquid, beware. I bought this for its purported blending power. It makes enough noise to wake the household, too
customer_reviews.author: Julia Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Zero Regrets
customer_reviews.text: The self clean function is less effective than manually altering the speed yourself, but it more than makes up for it in bone crushing capability. I make my dogs' and cat's food, and this makes it safe to feed them bones by literally grinding them to a fine pulp. It greatly exceeded my greatest hopes. This is definitely one of the best purchases I've ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Acidian

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I was never into smoothies before, but now I'm finding excuses to make them. It's also been great for making marinara sauce from scratch. I still haven't made a wide variety of of sauces/soups/etc. but I get the feeling this blender can handle about anything I throw at it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Moren

customer_reviews.title: This blender is great. I got the 2
customer_reviews.text: This blender is great. I got the 2.25 one. It's very powerful and looks very nice. I've been using it everyday with no problems. The presettings are handy. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: FBC

customer_reviews.title: It’s a mediocre blender.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but did not blend as well as stated. I didn’t even use ice. I used frozen fruit, milk and yogurt. It does the job though. I only used it though once since purchasing. Hoping it’ll make a good cocktail or two
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy very poorly built
customer_reviews.text: Had this blender for one week the motor burned out I called the manufacturer was told mail it back to us but I would need to pay postage they would repair it but not replace. DO NOT BUY rip off
customer_reviews.author: RAY k

customer_reviews.title: LOUD!
customer_reviews.text: This machine is terrifyingly LOUD. It's the loudest blender I have ever owned. (My landlord heard it the other night.) It's also only for smoothies, there are no other options that regular blenders have. I should have kept the packaging because I really want to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Georgina H. Smith

customer_reviews.title: I love this blender....but
customer_reviews.text: After a week of using, I noticed a burning/hot smell. Maybe I let it go too long mixing...will have to watch it and update later.
customer_reviews.author: Questant

customer_reviews.title: A great product for your everyday blending jobs!
customer_reviews.text: Have only had this for a few days, but I love it! It easily handles the quick jobs I want for everyday healthy eating (fresh fruit smoothies). I really like the smoothie button, but am especially pleased with the cleaning function (makes clean up easier). Unlike my old blender, this one does not require that I handle the blade for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Faye

customer_reviews.title: Blender Is Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a good blender with lots of features. Quiet and highly efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great blender!
customer_reviews.text: We love our Cuisinart blender. This blender is POWERFUL and has really performed better than expected. My wife has Crohn's Disease and this blender is necessary for fruits and vegetables and it is amazing. Amazing shakes, smoothies, herbs and spice chopper. You will not regret the purchase, nor the price. It does everything our friend’s Vitamix does, but we didn’t shell out $1,500
customer_reviews.author: Hen Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best blender or slush maker. I love the speeds and the different dials for use.
customer_reviews.author: Boochie

customer_reviews.title: Came with Crack in the Lid so leaks
customer_reviews.text: I had a previous commercial grade blender for 10 years and LOVED IT. This model is very loud and it came with a cracked lid so it leak every time I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jingles

customer_reviews.title: The best blender amongst peer products.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent blender! This is the one I boutght after compared with Vitamix, Blendtec and Waring. Super high power, amazingly 3.5HP! Blend things evenly, without any dead-zone. It has: 1. Vitamix's continuous speed control; 2. 6-prong sharp blade, even more than Vitamix's 4-prong sharp blade; 3. Blendtec's square-shape container and even higher 3.5HP! 4. 10-year motor warranty! Even more than Vitamix and Blentec. 5. Much lower price than Vitamix and Blendtec. All in All, it's the perfect blender that beats all mainstream FAMOUS brands' products. You should have it if you mean it.
customer_reviews.author: Hakunamatata

customer_reviews.title: It makes smoothies like no ither even drinds the BlackBerry and raspberry seeds up! Very powerful...
customer_reviews.text: I love this blender I have had many bkenders and by far thus us the best!! Cuisnart stands by there product and I know because I have returned a coffee pot and no problem getting a new one. This has a 3 year all warranty with a 10 year warranty on motor!
customer_reviews.author: Crash

customer_reviews.title: Terrible experience
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this a zero, which I would. The first blender we received was DOA. Not what you'd expect from a blender in the this price level. We finally received the replacement today and it's missing the removable "plug" in the top. I now get to waste my time returning this and waiting for a vitamix replacement. I'll never order a cuisinart or from this third party ever again. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: AD Meow

customer_reviews.title: Awesome blender. Even did the soup in it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome blender. Even did the soup in it. Seriously, you can make soup full stop in this thing (ingredients go in, and 5 min later you have hot soup....done!)
customer_reviews.author: Crist

customer_reviews.title: doesn’t make smoothies
customer_reviews.text: terrible. it won’t blend a smoothie without enough liquid that you end up with milk
customer_reviews.author: CJL

customer_reviews.title: then it is great. I am happy
customer_reviews.text: a grat product for the price. A little loud, but if you don't want to spend $500-600 just to get quiet, then it is great. I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Melody S. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Truly smooth.
customer_reviews.text: We pack kale and nuts in our smoothies and this comes out entirely smooth. Surprised how well it crushes ice, even very large cubes and very quickly. Great machine that does not disappointbb
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this blender it looks very nice and it’s so smooth less than 30 seconds things are ✅👌👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Yessenia

customer_reviews.title: i'm glad i bought it
customer_reviews.text: it is very efficient--easy to clean. it whipped through my carrot soup quickly. my only complaint is that it is quite loud. but, i should expect that from such a powerful appliance. i'm glad i bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Wells

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: A professional blender that has the build quality and power equal to or better than a Vitamix, without being overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: David R

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time. A lot quieter than our old ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. A lot quieter than our old 25 year old blender.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas D.

customer_reviews.title: Very noisy
customer_reviews.text: This will blend or chop anything. Love it but it is very noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Tolbert

customer_reviews.title: in my opinion this is just as good as the 1k vitamix
customer_reviews.text: I keep going to the juice bar and wasting about $10 to buy my blends because they have a 1k vitamix which makes them so smooth. After a ton of research I gave this a try and in 45 seconds it produces the same result. I am absolutely thrilled with this purchase, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Markov

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and Intelligent Blender
customer_reviews.text: It's very powerful and intelligent. The only thing I missed was the glass jaw. It's made of plastic. I could not find the glass option.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Lee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean & very powerful
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean & very powerful! Perfect for all the vegetables, seeds, and frozen fruit I throw in for my morning smoothie!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Kraus

customer_reviews.title: The blender works well enough, but is definitely not ...
customer_reviews.text: The blender works well enough, but is definitely not quiet, and really only has two speeds, high and low. There is no difference between high, smoothie and ice crush.
customer_reviews.author: Bill B.

customer_reviews.title: an I love it. It has never leaked and I have ...
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this blender about 3 weeks now. I have mae soups, sauces, salsa, frozen cocktails, smoothies, an I love it. It has never leaked and I have had the jar maxed out. This is a great blender, works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jean M. Dzialo

customer_reviews.title: I'm shocked at how this can cost half as much ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm shocked at how this can cost half as much as my old Vitamix and Blendtec yet have way more features and be smarter. Those other two are all hype.
customer_reviews.author: GeorgenStef

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this looking for a high end smoothie maker and couldn't be happier. As far as I can tell this competes with the two industries leaders for a couple hundred dollars less. This one has blended everything I've thrown at it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Noisy, but hey it's an excellent blender, so who cares! Def recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Isabella W

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: easy to use. convenient. fits nicely on countertop. it took me awhile to understand the controls, but works well. would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: A winner!
customer_reviews.text: Enjoying smoothies everyday with this lightweight easy to use blender. Good power and simple to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Austen

customer_reviews.title: Faulty
customer_reviews.text: I must've received a faulty bleeder. On my first use it smoked and seemed to over heat. Then it shut down. Returned after 2nd use , same results.
customer_reviews.author: Seymore

customer_reviews.title: It does not do a good job with our smoothies
customer_reviews.text: This blender has a hard time with ice unless you have a lot of liquid with it. It does not do a good job with our smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: Brian A Bain

customer_reviews.title: This is so awesome! I've used it for smoothies both fruit and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is so awesome! I've used it for smoothies both fruit and vegetables. I love the presets and the self cleaning!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smoothies are breeze. This thing has done everything I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Ammo Angler

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for 9 months now. Son uses it almost every day. Couldn't be happier!!
customer_reviews.author: ncarone

customer_reviews.title: The blender is awesome! We celebrated with Daiquiris last night and then ...
customer_reviews.text: The blender is awesome! We celebrated with Daiquiris last night and then smoothies this morning. This blender handled both beautifully, as if neither was a chore or difficult. I had struggled with which blender to purchase for quite some time. I am very pleased. I highly recommend this model.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: gear box already failed in six months, working on warrant
customer_reviews.text: great power, we have multiple Cuisinart products, this is first to fail. only used about 10 times
customer_reviews.author: lee carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Does a really good job. I like it for smoothies
customer_reviews.text: Does a really good job. I like it for smoothies, I have had no problems using the Hurricane to report
customer_reviews.author: rondondoe

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. Takes a fraction of the time to blend ice for protein shakes.
customer_reviews.author: Bill R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful blender. Like a professional one. Makes smoothies with tons of ice without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to the reviews
customer_reviews.text: This appliance has been great thus far. We have had delicious smoothies and awesome margaritas. The clean up is quick and easy!
customer_reviews.author: L Rene’

customer_reviews.title: Awesome appliance.
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to imagine an ingredient this thing can’t pulverize. Awesome appliance.
customer_reviews.author: MSx445

customer_reviews.title: Best green smoothie blender!
customer_reviews.text: I quite literally just received this blender today. I've been searching for a blender that will make a satisfactory green smoothie without leaving pieces behind. I finally found it. I will update my review after I have had a chance to try other things but if you're looking for a green smoothie blender, look no further! It passed my tiny strainer test with flying colors. The only thing my strainer caught were tiny pieces of my flax/chia blend. I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha S

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Not working after 4 months of occasional use. Manufactures accepts return for repair that can take 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful motor
customer_reviews.text: Great blender, very powerful. Would have liked the container to be glass, but have adjusted to the plastic.
customer_reviews.author: BJS

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was better
customer_reviews.text: My last cheaper blender that wasn’t too far off from this as far as blending power was way quieter. Also lack of more blending options
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: but was awesome at smoothly blending
customer_reviews.text: Too loud, but was awesome at smoothly blending. I returned because I was looking specifically for a quieter blender.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far is good, however it is little noisy, but works well for the need.
customer_reviews.author: Magdy Fouad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love, love this blender. As good as any Vita Mix but half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Eizabeth Spohr

customer_reviews.title: the power I like
customer_reviews.text: excellent choice for various use; I even make my own flour now
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price paid, too much plastic construction ...
customer_reviews.text: Okay for the price paid, too much plastic construction. Would have certainly returned it if paid anywhere near the MSRP listed.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Blender
customer_reviews.text: It is a great blender, we use it for smoothies, shakes, sauces, the auto cleaning function is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: works good so
customer_reviews.text: Impressive performance, lot of power, little pricey, works good so far
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin George

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Kitchen tool, highly recommendable. Powerful motor and easy to use. Cover may be difficult to remove sometimes...
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Very, very noisy but powerful. Smelled of burning wires when used. Sent back. Sadly, I have always liked Cuisinart.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Westfall

customer_reviews.title: Perfect smoothies!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a 25-30 yr. old cuisinart blender.....purchased it mainly to make smoothies and it does a fabulous job.....smoothies come out perfectly.......even my chia seeds disappear without a trace......only negative is how loud it is! It's a powerhouse though.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Living on the name.
customer_reviews.text: A respect for the brand name swayed me to hope this would be a good machine. After a couple of months of occasional use it is dull and weak and will no longer crush ice. I have learned my lesson and will count the months until I can justify and enjoy throwing this poor excuse for a blender away.
customer_reviews.author: Dyno

customer_reviews.title: No Brainer !!!
customer_reviews.text: Great machine ! Very powerful! Compared to Vitamix & Blendtec the Hurricane was priced half as much or less ! It was a great deal. It's a wonderful, powerful product. Truly a No-Brainer !!!
customer_reviews.author: b m

customer_reviews.title: we love
customer_reviews.text: cuisinart got it right on this product, we love it
customer_reviews.author: Richard W. Dumaine

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds the need
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but when you need to make Pisco Sours, this is what you need.
customer_reviews.author: Captain

customer_reviews.title: Super Powerful, Easy To Clean, Great Value
customer_reviews.text: So far, fantastic. Noisy? Sure. Though I don't know what anyone would expect with something that hammers that hard and fast...it is extremely powerful. Having previously owned, oh, I suppose maybe 3 varying degrees of cheap little blenders/mixers over the years, this is a whole different animal in terms of power and build quality. Really no comparison. I went with this unit based upon others' reviews, price point relative to Vitamix units, the excellent Cuisinart warranty, and finally, I like the idea of the BPA-free plastic reservoir itself, as opposed to worrying about busting glass. This is a terrific appliance, and I guess we'll see on durability and longevity.
customer_reviews.author: heyzarling

customer_reviews.title: I wish it also had a smaller jar like some other blenders
customer_reviews.text: There is no question that this is a top quality blender. The jar was larger than we expected. We tried to adapt to it, but it was too large for just the two of us. I wish it also had a smaller jar like some other blenders. Quality & performance was amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Proteus 3

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too gadgety, and too noisy. But apparently does a decent job. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: zip31

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this blender.....its junk.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this blender. I paid $165 for it thinking it would last.....in less than 9 months the bearings went out in the blade mechanism at the bottom of the jar/pitcher. We were getting a metallic taste in our smoothies when we stopped using it. While it was functioning it worked fine though very loud. I had to spend $51 to get it packaged up/mailed (bulky and heavy) back to Cuisinart and $11 to them to send it back.....$62 to get it repaired......not a very good warranty. You could spend half the price and get one that would last a year or more.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Don't want to spend the money on a vitamix? This is the blender to get
customer_reviews.text: Don't want to spend the money on a vitamix? This is the blender to get. I got this a couple days ago and am very satisfied. I feel like it definitely has power - 2.25 hp is 1677 watts of power which is a lot. It hasn't failed to blend anything so far. I've made smoothies and nut milk in it. Clean up is easy. I like it better than the Ninja we had before. It's quieter than the ninja. Feels more substantial than the ninja. Expectations exceeded!!
customer_reviews.author: CAHS

customer_reviews.title: Is it possible to have too much blender?
customer_reviews.text: This is an industrial grade blender in my opinion given how powerful it is an the large capacity. It was way too much blender for us. We prep smoothies and protein shakes two-three times a day for two people. There is sufficient volume here to prep enough solution for 4-6 people and there is no intermediate setting between 0 and low speed. The noise is pretty loud also. would be perfect for a business but not for us at home.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Tokyo

customer_reviews.title: Capacity, quality, and performance of this blender are terrific!
customer_reviews.text: This thing blends like no one's business - a true blending demon. The annoying thing about it is that when you plug it in and turn it on (or if it was already plugged in and on and went to sleep), it has a "splash screen" that takes "forever" (read: 5 seconds?) to "welcome you" to the wonderful world of Cuisinart. This is a blender, not the Starship Enterprise - just turn ON and BLEND.
customer_reviews.author: The Edge

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this blender in February of this year and 10 months later it no longer works. The digital panel blinks uncontrollably and no longer shows any information - a digital malfunction. This is very disappointing for a $300 plus blender! I never placed any parts in the dishwasher - everything washed by hand. I called Cuisinart and was told I have to mail the unit back to a repair facility and PAY for shipping both ways. That is the most outrageous, poor customer service I have ever encountered. This product is clearly defective and they don't stand behind their appliances. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Austin

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy. Dead after 1 year.
customer_reviews.text: Never in my life did I even think I'd spend $100+ on a blender....but I'm glad I did. This thing is a beast. The coupling that connects the cup to the motor is all metal too. None of that plastic stuff that melts at high rpms. Edit: 1 year later aaaand its broke. The bearing for the blade seized up and is very hard to spin. (Seems lots of other people are having this issue too) This was not used that much, and the most I ever threw at it was a frozen banana in my protein shake. Cant find just a replacement blade assembly for this model anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

product_meta.title: Cuisinart Hurricane Blender, 2.25 Peak, Gun Metal
product_meta.description: Color:Gunmetal| Size:2.25 PeakThis Cuisinart Hurricane blender is revved and ready to go. The professional power 2.25 peak HP motor handles even heavy pulverizing tasks with ease, and the double housing design keeps operation quiet. The 60-ounce BPA-free Tritan jar sits in a heavy-duty plastic base and is uniquely designed for easy pouring, with a soft-touch handle for a secure grip. This blender operates at the touch of a button, with Low and High speeds, Pulse and preprogrammed Smoothie and Ice Crush options. Features: Powerful 2.25 peak HP motor|Large 60-ounce BPA-free Tritan™ plastic jar with soft-grip handle|Automatic load-sensing technology|Quiet double housing design|Preprogrammed Smoothie and Ice Crush Functions|Electronic touchpad controls – Low High and Pulse|LCD display with programmable countdown timer|4-prong stainless steel heavy-duty blade assembly|Tight-seal lid with 2-ounce measuring cap|Gunmetal finish|Limited 3-year warranty
feature_bullets: Large 60-ounce BPA-free Tritan plastic jar with soft-grip handle
Preprogrammed Smoothie and Ice Crush Functions; Electronic touchpad controls - Low, High and Pulse
LCD display with programmable countdown timer
